languages.text: {n}Боли вы — пока — не чувствуете, только с удивлением следите за полетом кровавых брызг. Вы сами не понимаете, в какой момент ваша рука сгребла горло врага. Пальцы сжимаются сами собой, без вашей на то воли. Глаза бродяги округляются, изо рта с мерзкой вонью рвется хрип.{/n}

{n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Боли вы — пока — не чувствуете, только с удивлением следите за полетом кровавых брызг. Вы сами не понимаете, в какой момент ваша рука сгребла горло врага. Пальцы сжимаются сами собой, без вашей на то воли. Глаза бродяги округляются, изо рта с мерзкой вонью рвется хрип.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson flies through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the vagabond's throat. Your fingers clench around it on their own. The mutant's eyes go wide, and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

{n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson flies through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the vagabond's throat. Your fingers clench around it on their own. The mutant's eyes go wide, and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

{n}You do not feel any pain—not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson flies through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it on their own. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

{n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}少なくとも、まだ痛みは感じない。あなたはただ、深紅のしぶきが宙を舞うのを驚いて見ているだけだ。いつ自分の手が乞食の喉をつかんだのかわからない。指が勝手にその部分を握りしめているのだ。変異体は目を見開き、悪臭を放つ口からガラガラと音を立てた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}少なくとも、まだ痛みは感じない。あなたはただ、深紅のしぶきが宙を舞うのを驚いて見ているだけだ。いつ自分の手が乞食の喉をつかんだのかわからない。指が勝手にその部分を握りしめているのだ。変異体は目を見開き、悪臭を放つ口からガラガラと音を立てた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你并没有感觉到疼痛，至少现在还没感觉到。你只是惊奇地看着一束深红色的浪花在空中飞舞，随后，你的手指仿佛自己动了起来，紧紧地掐住了乞丐的喉咙。乞丐瞪大了眼睛，臭气熏天的嘴里发出了“嗬嗬”声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你并没有感觉到疼痛，至少现在还没感觉到。你只是惊奇地看着一束深红色的浪花在空中飞舞，随后，你的手指仿佛自己动了起来，紧紧地掐住了乞丐的喉咙。乞丐瞪大了眼睛，臭气熏天的嘴里发出了“嗬嗬”声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No sientes dolor, al menos todavía. Te limitas a observar sorprendid{mf|o|a} cómo un chorro de color carmesí se esparce por los aires. No sabes en qué momento tu mano ha agarrado la garganta del mendigo. Tus dedos se aprietan solos. Los ojos del mutante se abren de par en par y un ruido escapa de su boca apestosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No sientes dolor, al menos todavía. Te limitas a observar sorprendid{mf|o|a} cómo un chorro de color carmesí vuela por los aires. No sabes en qué momento tu mano ha agarrado la garganta del mendigo. Los dedos se aprietan solos. Los ojos del mutante se abren de par en par y un ruido escapa de su boca apestosa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst keinen Schmerz. Zumindest noch nicht. Du siehst nur überrascht zu, wie ein roter Nebel die Luft erfüllt. Du weißt nicht, wann deine Hand den Bettler an der Kehle gepackt hat. Deine Finger schließen sich von allein um sie. Die Augen des Mutanten weiten sich und ein Röcheln entweicht seinem stinkenden Mund.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst keinen Schmerz. Zumindest noch nicht. Du siehst nur überrascht zu, wie ein roter Sprühnebel durch die Luft fliegt. Du weißt nicht, wann deine Hand den Bettler bei der Kehle gepackt hat. Deine Finger schließen sich von alleine darum. Die Augen des Mutanten weiten sich und ein Röcheln entweicht seinem stinkenden Mund.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ne ressentez aucune douleur. Pas encore, du moins. Vous abaissez un regard surpris sur la lame alors que votre sang se met à jaillir à flots. Vous seriez bien incapable de dire quand votre main s'est refermée sur la gorge du mendiant, mais comme s'ils étaient animés d'une volonté propre, vos doigts se resserrent impitoyablement. Le mutant écarquille les yeux et exhale un souffle rauque qui vous prend au nez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne ressentez aucune douleur. Pas encore, du moins. Vous abaissez un regard surpris sur la lame alors que votre sang se met à couler à flots. Vous seriez bien incapable de dire quand votre main s'est refermée sur la gorge du mendiant, mais comme s'ils étaient animés d'une volonté propre, vos doigts se resserrent impitoyablement. Le mutant écarquille les yeux et exhale un souffle rauque qui vous prend au nez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}O an için acı hissetmiyorsun. Kızıl bir sıvı havaya püskürdüğünde şaşkınlıkla bakakalıyorsun. Ellerinin ne zaman dilencinin boğazına yapıştığını hatırlamıyorsun. Parmakların kendi kendine dilencinin boynuna sarılmış. Mutantın gözleri kocaman açılıyor ve pis kokulu ağzından bir ciyaklama çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not feel any pain — not yet, at least. You merely watch in surprise as a spray of crimson fans through the air. You do not know when your hand seized the beggar's throat. Your fingers clench around it of their own accord. The mutant's eyes go wide and a rattle escapes his reeking mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Acı hissetmiyorsun, en azından şimdilik. Kızıl bir sıvı havaya püskürdüğünde şaşkınlıkla bakakalıyorsun. Ellerinin ne zaman dilencinin boğazına yapıştığını hatırlamıyorsun. Parmakların kendi kendine dilencinin boynuna sarılmış. Mutantın gözleri kocaman açılıyor ve pis kokulu ağzından bir ciyaklama çıkıyor.{/n}
